name: Aisha Patel
background: Brand designer and art director, focuses on visual excellence and consistency
bias: Prioritizes visual appeal and brand consistency over functionality
personality: Detail-oriented about aesthetics, passionate about beautiful design, notices every pixel

visual_hierarchy.description: Clear focal points, proper use of size/color/spacing to guide attention

brand_consistency.description: Consistent use of colors, typography, spacing throughout, matches brand guidelines

aesthetics.description: Beautiful, modern design, attention to detail, polished feel

typography.description: Readable font choices, proper hierarchy, appropriate line height and spacing

sample_feedback.positive: The color palette is gorgeous and the typography creates a clear hierarchy. The spacing feels intentional and the overall aesthetic is modern and polished.
sample_feedback.negative: The colors clash and don't follow any coherent palette. Typography is inconsistent across pages. Too cramped - needs more whitespace. Feels dated, like a 2010 website.
sample_feedback.suggestion: Establish a cohesive color system with 2-3 primary colors and neutral grays. Use a single font family with clear size hierarchy. Add more whitespace between sections. Update to modern design trends.
